data.title: Schrattenfluh Vacation Rentals & Homes - Flühli, Switzerland
data.meta_description: Aug 9, 2024 - Rent from people in Schrattenfluh, Switzerland from € 18/night. Find unique places to stay with local hosts in 191 countries. Belong anywhere with Airbnb.
data.text:
Vacation home in Brienz

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 114 reviews4.97 (114)

Apartment Adlerhorst Unique Mountain and Lake View

Enjoy life in this quiet and centrally located accommodation with unique views of the beautiful village of the mountains and Lake Brienz. The apartment offers all the comforts with World Cup, tumbler, coffee and dishwasher, large outdoor seating area with sun loungers, sun protection, barbecue. Shopping opportunities, train station, ship station, Rothornbergbahn, public transport, playground, lake promenade, cinema are only a 10-minute walk away. Unobstructed parking at the back of the house. Ski resort 20min drive.

Rental unit in Bürglen

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 335 reviews4.99 (335)

Cozy, unique & stylish next to lake and mountains

The perfect place for those seeking peace and quiet and lovers of nature and beautiful spaces. This exclusive apartment is located on the top floor of a completely renovated detached farmhouse. Hiking or skiing … shopping or sightseeing in Lucerne or Interlaken ... or simply enjoy the lake in its shimmering colors. Surrounded by countless opportunities to discover Central Switzerland. The place for a break, vacation or your perfect honeymoon. NEW: incl. 2 Fully MTB S/M Air conditioner (Summer)

Rental unit in Sarnen

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 913 reviews4.97 (913)

Villa Wilen: Top views. Lakeside. Luxury. Popular.

Private suite on the top of the owners’ inhabited villa with lake access and unique views of the Alps. Most highlights can be reached in less than 1 hr. Layout: spacious bedroom (with home cinema), attached panorama lounge, large kitchen, bathroom - all privately used. For occupancy of 3-5 people another private bedroom/bathroom (floor below, access by lift) is provided. Access to lake and garden. Free parking/wifi. Children are possible, small dogs only. The most popular Airbnb in Switzerland.

Rental unit in Brienz

4.89 out of 5 average rating, 474 reviews4.89 (474)

CHALET ROMANTICA***** BEST LOCATION & BEST VIEW !

Fantastic lakefront apartment with spacious terrace and stunning mountain & lake views! Just 3 min walk to train/bus/boat- & mountain station, grocery, hiking trails, shops, restaurants, and boat rentals.Central Swiss train connections. By car to Interlaken (20 min), Lucerne (45 min), Grindelwald (35 min), and Bern (45 min). Enjoy jet boating, paragliding, SUP, adventure sports, Jungfraujoch, Titlis, Schilthorn, Brienz-Rothorn, Giessbach Falls, Grimsel-Furka Pass, and more. JUST COME AND RELAX!

Rental unit in Bönigen

4.88 out of 5 average rating, 102 reviews4.88 (102)

Studio for 2 near the lake, newly renovated

Completely renovated cozy studio in the immediate vicinity of Lake Brienz. Perfect for a couple / individual, with a fully equipped small kitchen, dining area, comfortable double bed, private bathroom with shower and outdoor seating area. The studio is located in a quiet area of Bönigen in a traditional Swiss chalet. Free WiFi. Fast and easily accessible from Interlaken Ost - travel time by bus less than 10 minutes. Paid parking in 200 m.

Rental unit in Ringgenberg

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 141 reviews4.99 (141)

Visit us to make memories for a lifetime

Welcome to our Chalet in Ringgenberg. Our Chalet is situated in a quiet and friendly residential area. By public transport, only about 7 minutes away from Interlaken. The bus stop, a supermarket and the lakes are only a short walk away. All tourist taxes(CHF 3.00 per person per night) and fees are included in the price. The apartement is on the groundfloor. Just feel at home, amd relax in a modern and spacious apartment.

Rental unit in Trub

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 297 reviews4.98 (297)

Cozy comfortable apartment in quiet nature

Alpine chic at its finest in beautiful nature - you don't have to do anything - you can do everything. Relax at the foot of the Napf in the Emmental valley. Pure nature with a certain luxury. Great for hikers and connoisseurs. Fresh spring water. Wi-Fi. Pleasantly quiet location. Modern, yet magnificentmental attic apartment with open kitchen, cozy balcony, large living and dining area, spacious gallery and bedroom.

Chalet in Sörenberg

5 out of 5 average rating, 181 reviews5 (181)

Wagli36 - Your Nature Hideaway

Wagli36 is a unique chalet in Wagliseiboden, Sörenberg, at 1318m in the UNESCO Biosphere. It offers stunning 180-degree views of the mountains. If you are looking for authentic nature, silence, dark nights to watch the stars and the Milky Way, numerous hiking paths, and biking routes in summer, or snowshoe trails, Nordic skiing, or ski tours right from your chalet, then this is the holiday home for you.

Rental unit in Hasliberg

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 352 reviews4.95 (352)

Hasliberg - nice view - apartment for two

New bright, cozy 1-room studio on the ground floor of a two-family house in a very quiet and sunny location. The studio also offers a unique panorama view of the fascinating view of the Bernese Alps. Available in the studio: Two single beds (foldable as a double bed). Swisscom Tv + radio, W-LAN, kitchenette with oven, ceramic hob with 2 plates, coffee machine, shower / WC. Private car park available.

Chalet in Brienz

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 109 reviews4.99 (109)

Holiday house for rent.

This beautiful rustic heimetli was newly renovated. It is located above Brienz away from the noise. By car, you are in 15. 20 min in Interlaken. You can drive directly to the holiday accommodation. In the area there are beautiful hiking trails and attractions such as the Ballenberg. You can shop in the village which is about 2,5 km away. The house has 2 parking spaces and sleeps 6.

Home in Trubschachen

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 132 reviews4.96 (132)

Vacation in the Municipality of Trub im Emmental

Freestanding Emmental store in a very quiet location with super views secluded on a mountain farm in the middle of nature at 1100 meters above sea level. Very nice for hiking Enjoy and end spans far away noise and stress!! Kitchen with wood heating ! Very cozy apartment.
